[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Signature Type Consistency] Is signature_type validated to be consistent across NonceRequest and SignatureShareRequest? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Timeout Processing] Can process() be called without checking process_timeout() first, bypassing timeout logic? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [DKG Threshold Check] When computing DKG size for threshold check, are key_ids counted correctly for weighted signers? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Malicious Tracking] Are malicious_signer_ids persisted across signing iterations within same round? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Threshold Computation] When computing num_malicious_keys, can integer underflow occur if malicious_signer_ids is invalid? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Iteration ID] Does sign_iter_id increment correctly when retrying after timeout? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [Private Shares] Are private shares decrypted and validated before being used? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Coordinator trait] [DKG End Failures] Are reported DKG failures from signers validated before aborting DKG? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Transition Validation] Can coordinator transition from DkgPublicGather to DkgPrivateDistribute without receiving any public shares? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Gather States] Do gather states (DkgPublicGather, DkgPrivateGather, etc.) timeout if waiting indefinitely? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Concurrent Rounds] Can coordinator handle concurrent DKG and signing rounds, or does state machine prevent this? High severity.

[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [Idle Transitions] From State::Idle, can coordinator transition to both DkgPublicDistribute and NonceRequest, causing confusion? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [State machine] [State Rollback] Can coordinator be forced back to earlier state by attacker sending old messages? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Num Signers vs Keys] Can num_signers > num_keys, and if so, does this break any assumptions? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Threshold Edge Cases] What happens when threshold == 1 or threshold == num_keys? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Signer Key IDs] Can signer_key_ids be empty for some signers, and does this break protocol? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Key ID Range] Are key_ids required to be in range [1, num_keys], and is this validated? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Overlapping Key IDs] Can two signers have overlapping key_ids in their signer_key_ids sets? Critical severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Public Keys Count] Must public_keys.signers.len() == num_signers, and is this enforced? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Message Key Reuse] Can message_private_key be same as a signer's key, causing signature confusion? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [Config] [Timeout Consistency] Should all timeouts be set together, or can mixing Some/None cause protocol issues? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState] [Inconsistent IDs] Can SavedState have current_sign_id < current_dkg_id in invalid configurations? Medium severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState] [Missing Aggregate Key] Can SavedState be in signing state without aggregate_public_key being Some? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState] [Share Count Mismatch] Can dkg_public_shares.len() != dkg_private_shares.len() in valid SavedState? High severity.
[File: src/state_machine/coordinator/mod.rs] [SavedState] [Empty Polynomials] Can party_polynomials be empty when aggregate_public_key is Some? High severity.
